overview: Rosanna most recently managed the Music Content team at Clear Channel Radio Digital where she booked live performances, artist interviews and music streams for national on-demand consumption across 850+ radio station websites. She was also responsible for expanding Clear Channel’s online content into the world of film, fashion and TV. Rosanna began her career in the PR department at Jive Records where she assisted with campaigns for artists such as Justin Timberlake, Britney Spears, P!NK, and R. Kelly. While there, Rosanna met the future founders of M2M Construction, a boutique PR & Marketing firm that launched her career in artist relations.
